meanings.sent1: She swooned after seeing the scary movie.
meanings.sent2: The girl swooned and fell to the ground during the play.
meanings.sent3: The cat swooned dramatically after chasing its tail too fast.
meanings.sent4: The old clock swooned and stopped ticking suddenly.
meanings.sent5: The tired hiker swooned from exhaustion at the mountain's peak.

meanings.definition: Was overwhelmed by emotion or admiration.
meanings.sent1: He swooned when he received the surprise gift.
meanings.sent2: The audience swooned over the talented singer's performance.
meanings.sent3: The puppy swooned with joy when its owner returned home.
meanings.sent4: The garden swooned with colors in the bright sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The child swooned with excitement at the sight of the circus.
